    preCheckUserCartId​(Supplier authentication, org.springframework.security.web.access.intercept.RequestAuthorizationContext object, String... auths)
    > If the user has the authority of the given auths or the user is of type User and the cartId in the request is the same as the cartId of the user, then return true
    org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDecision
    preCheckUserCartIdAndCartItemId​(Supplier authentication, org.springframework.security.web.access.intercept.RequestAuthorizationContext object, String... auths)
    > This function checks if the user has the authority of the auths passed as arguments and if the cartId and cartItemId passed as arguments are associated with the user
    org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDecision
    preCheckUserOrderId​(Supplier authentication, org.springframework.security.web.access.intercept.RequestAuthorizationContext object, String... auths)
    If the user has the authority of the auths, or the user is of type User and the orderId is in the user's records, then the user is authorized
    org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDecision
    preCheckUserWalletId​(Supplier<org.springframework.security.core.Authentication> authentication, org.springframework.security.web.access.intercept.RequestAuthorizationContext object, String... auths)
    > If the user has the authority of `auths` or the user is of type `User` and the walletId in the request is associated with the user, then the user is authorized
    org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDecision
    preCheckUserWithId​(Supplier authentication, org.springframework.security.web.access.intercept.RequestAuthorizationContext object, String... auths)
    If the user has the authority of the given auths or the user's email is the same as the email of the user with the given id and the user is of type User, then return true

      public org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDecision preCheckUserWithId​(Supplier authentication, org.springframework.security.web.access.intercept.RequestAuthorizationContext object, String... auths)
      If the user has the authority of the given auths or the user's email is the same as the email of the user with the given id and the user is of type User, then return true

      authentication - The authentication object that was passed to the method.
      object - The object that is being authorized.

    • preCheckUserOrderId

      public org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDecision preCheckUserOrderId​(Supplier authentication, org.springframework.security.web.access.intercept.RequestAuthorizationContext object, String... auths)
      If the user has the authority of the auths, or the user is of type User and the orderId is in the user's records, then the user is authorized
      Parameters:
      authentication - The authentication object that was used to authenticate the user.
      object - The object being authorized.
      Returns:
      AuthorizationDecision

    • preCheckUserCartIdAndCartItemId

      public org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDecision preCheckUserCartIdAndCartItemId​(Supplier authentication, org.springframework.security.web.access.intercept.RequestAuthorizationContext object, String... auths)
      > This function checks if the user has the authority of the auths passed as arguments and if the cartId and cartItemId passed as arguments are associated with the user
      Parameters:
      authentication - The authentication object that was passed into the method.
      object - The object being secured.
      Returns:
      AuthorizationDecision is being returned.

    • preCheckUserWalletId

      public org.springframework.security.authorization.AuthorizationDecision preCheckUserWalletId​(Supplier<org.springframework.security.core.Authentication> authentication, org.springframework.security.web.access.intercept.RequestAuthorizationContext object, String... auths)
      > If the user has the authority of `auths` or the user is of type `User` and the walletId in the request is associated with the user, then the user is authorized
      Parameters:
      authentication - The authentication object that was created by the previous authorization provider.
      object - The object being authorized.
      Returns:
      AuthorizationDecision is being returned.
